sentences.sContent: Soon, patchouli redolent shawls become fashionable in the 19th century France, paralleling the rise of patchouli as a fragrance ingredient.
sentences.sContent_eng: Soon, patchouli redolent shawls become fashionable in the 19th century France, paralleling the rise of patchouli as a fragrance ingredient.
sentences.sCn: 很快，散发着广藿香芬芳的羊毛披肩在19世纪的法国流行了开来，带动了将广藿香作为原始香材使用的风潮。

synos.tran: 芬芳的；有…香味的；令人想起…的

remMethod.val: red(=re加强) + ol(气味) + ent → 散发出浓郁的气味 → 芳香的
